title: A Disney Christmas Gift (1982) [VHSRip, FS, Eng] - QuincyMKT
description:
A Disney Christmas Gift (1982)

A Disney Christmas Gift is a 47-minute Christmas television special which aired on December 4, 1982 on CBS' The Wonderful World of Disney. The special is a Christmas-themed compilation of animated shorts featuring Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck combined with excerpts from Disney feature films as well as the 1933 classic short "The Night Before Christmas". The opening and closing numbers, featuring the songs "On Christmas Morning" and its reprise, showcase Christmas at Disneyland.

Segments:
"Once Upon a Wintertime" - Melody Time (1948)
"Pluto's Christmas Tree" - Mickey Mouse, Pluto and Chip 'n Dale (1951) 
Bambi and Thumper - Bambi (1942) 
Peter Pan and the Darling children - Peter Pan (1953) 
"The Clock Watcher" - Donald Duck (1945) 
Merlin, Arthur and Archimedes the Owl - The Sword in the Stone (1963) 
Cinderella and Fairy Godmother - Cinderella (1950) 
"The Night Before Christmas" - Silly Symphonies (1933) 

Ripped for a VHS cassette bought at Walt Disney World in 1992.

Output codec: XviD
Audio: English AC3 2ch
Subtitles: none
Format: AVI
Aspect Ratio: 1.33 Fullscreen
Runtime: 47 min.
Color


Merry Christmas!
